docs.description: open full Gemini CLI documentation in your browser
docs.sandbox_message:
Please open the following URL in your browser to view the documentation:
{url}

mcp.description: list configured MCP servers and tools
mcp.no_servers: No MCP servers configured. Opening documentation in your browser: {url}
mcp.no_servers_sandbox:
No MCP servers configured. Please open the following URL in your browser to view documentation:
{url}
mcp.servers_starting: ‚è≥ MCP servers are starting up ({count} initializing)...
mcp.first_startup_note: Note: First startup may take longer. Tool availability will update automatically.

bug.submit_message:
To submit your bug report, please open the following URL in your browser:
{url}
bug.browser_error: Could not open URL in browser: {error}

chat.no_client: No chat client available for conversation status.

resume.not_found: No saved checkpoint found with tag: {tag}.

chat.unknown_command: Unknown /chat command: {command}. Available: list, save, resume

compress.description: Compresses the context by replacing it with a summary.
compress.already_compressing: Already compressing, wait for previous request to complete

fallback_improved.description: toggle between improved fallback strategy (7 attempts, 2s delays, reset to Pro) and original Google behavior (2 attempts, exponential backoff)
fallback_improved.improved_description: Improved strategy: 7 attempts with 2s delays, reset to Pro on each message
fallback_improved.original_description: Original strategy: 2 attempts with exponential backoff, stay on Flash once switched

model_switch.description: switch between Gemini Pro and Flash models

stay_pro.description: toggle whether to stay on Pro model (disable/enable fallback to Flash)
stay_pro.disabled: Fallback disabled - will stay on Gemini Pro even if rate limited
stay_pro.enabled: Fallback enabled - will switch to Flash if Pro is rate limited

restore.description: restore a tool call. This will reset the conversation and file history to the state it was in when the tool call was suggested
restore.no_directory: Could not determine the .gemini directory path.
restore.project_restored: Restored project to the state before the tool call.
restore.read_error: Could not read restorable tool calls. This is the error: {error}

refresh.description: Refresh the memory from the source.
refresh.success_with_content: Memory refreshed successfully. Loaded {charCount} characters from {fileCount} file(s).
refresh.success_no_content: Memory refreshed successfully. No memory content found.

clear.description: clear the screen and conversation history

help.add_context_help: Use {symbol} to specify files for context (e.g., {example}) to target specific files or folders.
help.shell_mode_help: Execute shell commands via {symbol} (e.g., {example}) or use natural language (e.g. {natural_example}).

shortcuts.new_line_linux: New line (Alt+Enter works for certain linux distros)
shortcuts.jump_words: Jump through words in the input

auth.dialog_question: How would you like to authenticate for this project?

messages.api_key_detected: Existing API key detected (GEMINI_API_KEY). Select "Gemini API Key" option to use it.
messages.must_select_auth: You must select an auth method to proceed. Press Ctrl+C twice to exit.
messages.terms_privacy: Terms of Services and Privacy Notice for Gemini CLI
messages.auth_timeout: Authentication timed out. Please try again.
messages.waiting_for_auth: Waiting for auth... (Press ESC to cancel)

tool_confirmation.save_close_editor: Save and close external editor to continue

questions.allow_mcp_tool: Allow execution of MCP tool "{toolName}" from server "{serverName}"?

options.yes_always_tool: Yes, always allow tool "{toolName}" from server "{serverName}"
options.yes_always_server: Yes, always allow all tools from server "{serverName}"

phrases: Note: Full 141 loading phrases can be extracted later as needed

messages.use_enter_tab: (Use Enter to select, Tab to change focus)
messages.supported_editors: These editors are currently supported. Please note that some editors cannot be used in sandbox mode.

tips.title: Tips for getting started:
tips.tip1: Ask questions, edit files, or run commands.
tips.tip2: Be specific for the best results.
tips.tip3_with_gemini: Create {filename} files to customize your interactions with Gemini.

show_more.press_ctrl_s: Press ctrl-s to show more lines

compression.compressed: Chat history compressed from {original} to {new} tokens.

stats.no_api_calls: No API calls have been made in this session.
stats.no_tool_calls: No tool calls have been made in this session.

messages.cached_tokens: {count} ({percentage}%) of input tokens were served from the cache, reducing costs.
messages.tip_full_breakdown: ¬ª Tip: For a full token breakdown, run `/stats model`.

update.available:
Gemini CLI update available! {current} ‚Üí {latest}
Run npm install -g {packageName} to update
